name: Stench
description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.
prose: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon [flinch]{mechanic:flinch} with each hit.

name: Drizzle
description: The Pokémon makes it rain if it appears in battle.
prose: Summons [rain]{mechanic:rain} that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

name: Speed Boost
description: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.
prose: Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} after each turn.

name: Sturdy
description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
prose: Prevents being KOed from full [HP]{mechanic:hp}# leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

name: Damp
description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
prose: Prevents []{move:self-destruct}# []{move:explosion}# and []{ability:aftermath} from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

name: Limber
description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.
battle text: {defender} cannot be paralyzed due to it's LIMBER.

name: Sand Veil
description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.
prose: Increases [evasion]{mechanic:evasion} to 1.25x during a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm}.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

name: Static
description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.
prose: Has a 30% chance of [paralyzing]{mechanic:paralysis} attacking Pokémon on contact.

name: Volt Absorb
description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
prose: Absorbs []{type:electric} moves# healing for 1/4 max [HP]{mechanic:hp}.

name: Water Absorb
description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
prose: Absorbs []{type:water} moves# healing for 1/4 max [HP]{mechanic:hp}.

name: Cloud Nine
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.
prose: Negates all effects of [weather]{mechanic:weather}# but does not prevent the weather itself.

name: Compound Eyes
description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.
prose: Increases moves' [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} to 1.3x.

name: Insomnia
description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
battle text: {defender} cannot fall asleep due to it's INSOMNIA.

name: Color Change
description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.
prose: Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.

name: Immunity
description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
battle text: {defender} cannot be poisoned due to it's IMMUNITY.

name: Flash Fire
description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
prose: Protects against []{type:fire} moves.  Once one has been blocked# the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5x damage until it leaves battle.

name: Shield Dust
description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.
prose: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.

name: Own Tempo
description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
battle text: {defender} cannot be confused due it's OWN TEMPO.

name: Suction Cups
description: Negates all moves that force switching out.
prose: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.

name: Intimidate
description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.
prose: Lowers opponents' [Attack]{mechanic:attack} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon entering battle.

name: Shadow Tag
description: Prevents the foe from escaping.
prose: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.

name: Rough Skin
description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
prose: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic:hp} on contact.

name: Wonder Guard
description: Only supereffective moves will hit.
prose: Protects against damaging moves that are not [super effective]{mechanic:super-effective}.

name: Levitate
description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
prose: Evades []{type:ground} moves.

name: Effect Spore
description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.
prose: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either [paralysis]{mechanic:paralysis}# [poison]{mechanic:poison}# or [sleep]{mechanic:sleep} on attacking Pokémon on contact.

name: Synchronize
description: Passes a burn# poison# or paralysis to the foe.
prose: Copies [burns]{mechanic:burn}# [paralysis]{mechanic:paralysis}# and [poison]{mechanic:poison} received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

name: Clear Body
description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
prose: Prevents stats from being [lowered]{mechanic:stat-modifier} by other Pokémon.

name: Natural Cure
description: All status problems heal when it switches out.
prose: Cures any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} upon switching out.

name: Lightning Rod
description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.
prose: Redirects single-target []{type:electric} moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves# raising [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.

name: Serene Grace
description: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.
prose: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

name: Swift Swim
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.
prose: Doubles [Speed]{mechanic:speed} during [rain]{mechanic:rain}.

name: Chlorophyll
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.
prose: Doubles [Speed]{mechanic:speed} during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}.

name: Illuminate
description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.
prose: Doubles the wild encounter rate.

name: Trace
description: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.
prose: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

name: Huge Power
description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.
prose: Doubles [Attack]{mechanic:attack} in battle.

name: Poison Point
description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
prose: Has a 30% chance of [poisoning]{mechanic:poison} attacking Pokémon on contact.

name: Inner Focus
description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.
prose: Prevents [flinching]{mechanic:flinching}.

name: Magma Armor
description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.
prose: Prevents [freezing]{mechanic:freezing}.

name: Water Veil
description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
prose: Prevents [burns]{mechanic:burn}.

name: Magnet Pull
description: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.
prose: Prevents []{type:steel} opponents from fleeing or switching out.

name: Soundproof
description: Gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.
prose: Protects against sound-based moves.

name: Rain Dish
description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
prose: Heals for 1/16 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn during [rain]{mechanic:rain}.

name: Sand Stream
description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.
prose: Summons a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm} that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

name: Pressure
description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.
prose: Increases the [PP]{mechanic:pp} cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

name: Thick Fat
description: Ups resistance to Fire-​ and Ice-type moves.
prose: Halves damage from []{type:fire} and []{type:ice} moves.

name: Early Bird
description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
prose: Makes [sleep]{mechanic:sleep} pass twice as quickly.

name: Flame Body
description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
prose: Has a 30% chance of [burning]{mechanic:burn} attacking Pokémon on contact.

name: Run Away
description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
prose: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

name: Keen Eye
description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.
prose: Prevents [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} from being [lowered]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.

name: Hyper Cutter
description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.
prose: Prevents [Attack]{mechanic:attack} from being [lowered]{mechanic:stat-modifiers} by other Pokémon.

name: Pickup
description: The Pokémon may pick up items.
prose: Picks up other Pokémon's used and [Flung]{move:fling} held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

name: Truant
description: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.
prose: Skips every second turn.

name: Hustle
description: Boosts the Attack stat# but lowers accuracy.
prose: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5x damage# but decreases their [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} to 0.8x.

name: Cute Charm
description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
prose: Has a 30% chance of [infatuating]{mechanic:infatuation} attacking Pokémon on contact.

name: Plus
description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
prose: Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5x when a friendly Pokémon has []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus}.

name: Minus
description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
prose: Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5x when a friendly Pokémon has []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus}.

name: Forecast
description: Castform transforms with the weather.
prose: Changes []{pokemon:castform}'s type and form to match the [weather]{mechanic:weather}.

name: Sticky Hold
description: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.
prose: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.

name: Shed Skin
description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.
prose: Has a 33% chance of curing any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} after each turn.

name: Guts
description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
prose: Increases [Attack]{mechanic:attack} to 1.5x with a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}.

name: Marvel Scale
description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.
prose: Increases [Defense]{mechanic:defense} to 1.5x with a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}.

name: Liquid Ooze
description: Damages attackers using any draining move.
prose: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

name: Overgrow
description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
prose: Strengthens []{type:grass} moves to inflict 1.5x damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.

name: Blaze
description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.
prose: Strengthens []{type:fire} moves to inflict 1.5x damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.

name: Torrent
description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.
prose: Strengthens []{type:water} moves to inflict 1.5x damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.

name: Swarm
description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
prose: Strengthens []{type:bug} moves to inflict 1.5x damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.

name: Rock Head
description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
prose: Protects against recoil damage.

name: Drought
description: Turns the sunlight harsh if it is in battle.
prose: Summons [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight} that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

name: Arena Trap
description: Prevents the foe from fleeing.
prose: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.  Eluded by []{type:flying}-types and Pokémon in the air.

name: Vital Spirit
description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
battle text: {defender} cannot fall asleep due to it's VITAL SPIRIT.
prose: Prevents [sleep]{mechanic:sleep}.

name: White Smoke
description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
prose: Prevents stats from being [lowered]{mechanic:stat-modifier} by other Pokémon.

name: Pure Power
description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.
prose: Doubles [Attack]{mechanic:attack} in battle.

name: Shell Armor
description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

name: Air Lock
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.
prose: Negates all effects of [weather]{mechanic:weather}# but does not prevent the weather itself.

name: Tangled Feet
description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
prose: Doubles [evasion]{mechanic:evasion} when [confused]{mechanic:confusion}.

name: Motor Drive
description: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.
prose: Absorbs []{type:electric} moves# raising [Speed]{mechanic:speed} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.

name: Rivalry
description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.
prose: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25x against Pokémon of the same gender# but decreases damage to 0.75x against the opposite gender.

name: Steadfast
description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.
prose: Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon [flinching]{mechanic:flinching}.

name: Snow Cloak
description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.
prose: Increases evasion to 1.25x during [hail]{mechanic:hail}.  Protects against hail damage.

name: Gluttony
description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
prose: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low [HP]{mechanic:hp} below 1/2 its max HP.

name: Anger Point
description: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.
prose: Raises [Attack]{mechanic:attack} to the maximum of six [stages]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon receiving a [critical hit]{mechanic:critical-hit}.

name: Unburden
description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.
prose: Doubles [Speed]{mechanic:speed} upon using or losing a held item.

name: Heatproof
description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
prose: Halves damage from []{type:fire} moves and [burns]{mechanic:burn}.

name: Simple
description: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.
prose: Doubles the Pokémon's [stat modifiers]{mechanic:stat-modifiers}.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

name: Dry Skin
description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.
prose: Causes 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} in damage each turn during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}# but heals for 1/8 max HP during [rain]{mechanic:rain}.  Increases damage from []{type:fire} moves to 1.25x# but absorbs []{type:water} moves# healing for 1/4 max HP.

name: Download
description: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.
prose: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon entering battle.

name: Iron Fist
description: Boosts the power of punching moves.
prose: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2x their power.

name: Poison Heal
description: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
prose: Heals for 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn when [poisoned]{mechanic:poison} in place of damage.

name: Adaptability
description: Powers up moves of the same type.
prose: Increases the [same-type attack bonus]{mechanic:same-type-attack-bonus} from 1.5x to 2x.

name: Skill Link
description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.
prose: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and []{move:triple-kick} to their full length every time.

name: Hydration
description: Heals status problems if it is raining.
prose: Cures any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} after each turn during [rain]{mechanic:rain}.

name: Solar Power
description: In sunshine# Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.
prose: Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5x but costs 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}.

name: Quick Feet
description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
prose: Increases [Speed]{mechanic:speed} to 1.5x with a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}.

name: Normalize
description: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.
prose: Makes the Pokémon's moves all act []{type:normal}-type.

name: Sniper
description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.
prose: Strengthens [critical hits]{mechanic:critical-hit} to inflict 3x damage rather than 2x.

name: Magic Guard
description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
prose: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

name: No Guard
description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
prose: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.

name: Stall
description: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
prose: Makes the Pokémon move last within its move's priority bracket.

name: Technician
description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
prose: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5x their power.

name: Leaf Guard
description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.
prose: Protects against [major status ailments]{mechanic:major-status-ailments} during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}.

name: Klutz
description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.
prose: Prevents the Pokémon from using its held item in battle.

name: Mold Breaker
description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.
prose: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.

name: Super Luck
description: Heightens the critical- hit ratios of moves.
prose: Raises moves' [critical hit]{mechanic:critical-hit} rates one stage.

name: Aftermath
description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
prose: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max [HP]{mechanic:hp} when knocked out by a contact move.

name: Anticipation
description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.
prose: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a [super-effective]{mechanic:super-effective} move# []{move:self-destruct}# []{move:explosion}# or a one-hit KO move.

name: Forewarn
description: Determines what moves a foe has.
prose: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

name: Unaware
description: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.
prose: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.

name: Tinted Lens
description: Powers up “not very effective” moves.
prose: Doubles damage inflicted with [not-very-effective]{mechanic:not-very-effective} moves.

name: Filter
description: Reduces damage from supereffective attacks.
prose: Decreases damage taken from [super-effective]{mechanic:super-effective} moves by 1/4.

name: Slow Start
description: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.
prose: Halves [Attack]{mechanic:attack} and [Speed]{mechanic:speed} for five turns upon entering battle.

name: Scrappy
description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
prose: Lets the Pokémon's []{type:normal} and []{type:fighting} moves hit []{type:ghost} Pokémon.

name: Storm Drain
description: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.
prose: Redirects single-target []{type:water} moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Water moves# raising [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.

name: Ice Body
description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
prose: Heals for 1/16 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

name: Solid Rock
description: Reduces damage from supereffective attacks.
prose: Decreases damage taken from [super-effective]{mechanic:super-effective} moves by 1/4.

name: Snow Warning
description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.
prose: Summons [hail]{mechanic:hail} that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

name: Honey Gather
description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.
prose: The Pokémon may pick up []{item:honey} after battle.

name: Frisk

name: Reckless

prose: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2x their power.

name: Multitype

prose: Changes []{pokemon:arceus}'s type and form to match its held Plate.

name: Flower Gift

name: Bad Dreams

prose: Damages [sleeping]{mechanic:sleep} opponents for 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn.

name: Pickpocket

prose: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3x their power# but prevents their extra effects.

name: Contrary

name: Unnerve

name: Defiant

name: Defeatist

name: Healer

name: Friend Guard

name: Heavy Metal
description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

name: Light Metal
description: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

name: Toxic Boost

name: Flare Boost

prose: Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5x when [burned]{mechanic:burn}.

name: Harvest

name: Telepathy
description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
prose: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

name: Moody
description: Raises one stat and lowers another.
prose: Raises a random stat two [stages]{mechanic:stat-modifier} and lowers another one stage after each turn.

name: Overcoat
description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
prose: Protects against damage from [weather]{mechanic:weather}.

name: Poison Touch
description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.
prose: Has a 30% chance of [poisoning]{mechanic:poison} target Pokémon upon contact.

name: Regenerator

name: Big Pecks

name: Wonder Skin

name: Analytic

name: Iron Barbs
description: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

name: Zen Mode

name: Victory Star

prose: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1x for friendly Pokémon.

name: Turboblaze
description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

name: Teravolt
description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.
prose: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.

name: Aroma Veil
prose: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.

name: Flower Veil
prose: Protects friendly []{type:grass} Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

name: Cheek Pouch
prose: Restores HP upon eating a Berry# in addition to the Berry's effect.

name: Protean
prose: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

name: Fur Coat
prose: Halves damage from physical attacks.

name: Magician
prose: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.

name: Bulletproof
prose: Protects against bullet# ball# and bomb-based moves.

name: Competitive
prose: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

name: Strong Jaw
prose: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5x their power.

name: Refrigerate
prose: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:ice} moves and strengthens them to 1.3x their power.

name: Sweet Veil
prose: Prevents friendly Pokémon from sleeping.

name: Stance Change
prose: Changes []{pokemon:aegislash} to Blade Forme before using a damaging move# or Shield Forme before using []{move:kings-shield}.

name: Gale Wings
prose: Raises []{type:flying} moves' priority by one stage.

name: Mega Launcher
prose: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5x their power.

name: Grass Pelt
prose: Boosts Defense while []{move:grassy-terrain} is in effect.

name: Symbiosis
prose: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

name: Tough Claws
prose: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33x their power.

name: Pixilate
prose: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:fairy} moves and strengthens them to 1.3x their power.

name: Gooey
prose: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

name: Aerilate
prose: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:flying} moves and strengthens them to 1.3x their power.

name: Parental Bond
prose: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.

name: Dark Aura
prose: Strengthens []{type:dark} moves to 1.33x their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

name: Fairy Aura
prose: Strengthens []{type:fairy} moves to 1.33x their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

name: Aura Break
prose: Makes []{ability:dark-aura} and []{ability:fairy-aura} weaken moves of their respective types.

name: Primordial Sea
prose: Creates heavy rain# which has all the properties of Rain Dance# cannot be replaced# and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.

name: Desolate Land
prose: Creates extremely harsh sunlight# which has all the properties of Sunny Day# cannot be replaced# and causes damaging Water moves to fail.

name: Delta Stream
prose: Creates a mysterious air current# which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokémon.

name: Stamina
prose: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

name: Wimp Out
prose: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.

name: Emergency Exit
prose: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.

name: Water Compaction
prose: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

name: Merciless
prose: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.

name: Shields Down
prose: Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form.  Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.

name: Stakeout
prose: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.

name: Water Bubble
prose: Halves damage from Fire moves# doubles damage of Water moves# and prevents burns.

name: Steelworker
prose: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5x power.

name: Berserk
prose: Raises this Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.

name: Slush Rush
prose: During Hail# this Pokémon has double Speed.

name: Long Reach
prose: This Pokémon's moves do not make contact.

name: Liquid Voice
prose: Sound-based moves become Water-type.

name: Triage
prose: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

name: Galvanize
prose: This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2x.

name: Surge Surfer
prose: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.

name: Schooling
prose: Wishiwashi becomes Schooling Form when its HP is 25% or higher.

name: Disguise
prose: Prevents the first instance of battle damage.

name: Battle Bond
prose: Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.

name: Power Construct
prose: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.

name: Corrosion
prose: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.

name: Comatose
prose: This Pokémon always  acts as though it were Asleep.

name: Queenly Majesty
prose: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

name: Innards Out
prose: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move# that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

name: Dancer
prose: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move# this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

name: Battery
prose: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3x.

name: Fluffy
prose: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.

name: Dazzling
prose: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

name: Soul-Heart
prose: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.

name: Tangling Hair
prose: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move# the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

name: Receiver
prose: When an ally faints# this Pokémon gains its Ability.

name: Power of Alchemy
prose: When an ally faints# this Pokémon gains its Ability.

name: Beast Boost
prose: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.

name: RKS System
prose: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.

name: Electric Surge
prose: When this Pokémon enters battle# it changes the terrain to Electric Terrain.

name: Psychic Surge
prose: When this Pokémon enters battle# it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.

name: Misty Surge
prose: When this Pokémon enters battle# it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.

name: Grassy Surge
prose: When this Pokémon enters battle# it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.

name: Full Metal Body
prose: Other Pokémon cannot lower this Pokémon's stats.

name: Shadow Shield
prose: When this Pokémon has full HP# regular damage from moves is halved.

name: Prism Armor
prose: Reduces super-effective damage to 0.75x.

name: Neuroforce
prose: XXX new effect for neuroforce
